reviews.review: The best of the series! The whole story had me, literally, on the edge of my seat, and tense..... I am a comic geek and I was surprised at almost every turn!!! The finally was epic, can't WAIT for Captain marvel and the next avengers.

This film was absolutely amazing. It provided plenty of screen time for each character considering the size of the cast. A film where the villian finally wins. A true mix of both reasonably dark and funny at the same time.

This movie had a lot of hype to live up to and for the most part it did. Infinity War efficiently fit a lot of substance in a short amount of time. All the sub-franchises seamlessly crossed over into one epic flick. It was not a perfect movie, as I thought the story had some minor holes in different parts throughout. Marvel did make in my opinion much needed change from past films, that helped revamp the franchise, and take away from its predictability. Like all Marvel movies there was good humor (not as much as Guardians of the Galaxy), quality music, and great graphics and editing.
wow wow wow wow!! so much fun and what an amazing theater experience!!
Poor  ending .. and capt is kinda weak in this movie..

Starts of pedal to the metal. There's a pause to catch everyone up, but after that it's back to full throttle. The story jumps between simultaneous events continuously keeping you engaged. There is no downtime in this film, yet it's not difficult to keep up with what's going on. Due to the pacing and the "race against time" feel it leaves you raw, making the dramatic moments hit you even harder. This movie will have you leaving the theater feeling like no other Marvel movie has before.

Brilliant. I've knocked 1/2 a star off because of a couple of tiny things that I felt were missed opportunities or out of character ( I won't say what as they may be spoilers) , otherwise this pretty much is the perfect superhero/ action film. It's brilliant to finally have a great villain. The new Star Wars films could learn from this. Having just watched it a 2nd time, I've amended my rating and given it the extra 1/2 star. This is definitely a 5 star film. Amazing!
This movie has given me the 2 hours and 30 minutes of my life, the Rusoo Brothers have done a great job with this movie and the deserve more of 90% of puntuation
